Articles.Content:
Hi everyone, I got a problem trying to launch DMP. I installed it as it is describe in the "README.txt" in the downloaded file, but when I launch my game :

-the button "Dark Multiplayer-Disclaimer" appear (only with the tittle oO) and I can't interact with it

-when I launch a "resume game", I got a DMP folder, with the quote " incompatible with this version of ksp" (I play on the last version of KSP)

I reinstalled ksp and added only the DMP (and of course DMPUpdater...) mod, and I'm playing on Windows 64bits. Does anyone got an idea how I can fix that ? 

Thank you and sorry if the similar problem had already been resolved on the forum ( and sorry for my bad english x) )

hi do yo solve the problem?

you can reinstall the DMP

where do you downloadDMP?

delete your current DMP and download it at DMP's website

On 3/4/2017 at 2:21 PM, engaer14 said:

Hi everyone, I got a problem trying to launch DMP. I installed it as it is describe in the "README.txt" in the downloaded file, but when I launch my game :

-the button "Dark Multiplayer-Disclaimer" appear (only with the tittle oO) and I can't interact with it

-when I launch a "resume game", I got a DMP folder, with the quote " incompatible with this version of ksp" (I play on the last version of KSP)

I reinstalled ksp and added only the DMP (and of course DMPUpdater...) mod, and I'm playing on Windows 64bits. Does anyone got an idea how I can fix that ? 

Thank you and sorry if the similar problem had already been resolved on the forum ( and sorry for my bad english x) )

 

Hey, I found a fix to the issue.  Use the 64 bit version of KSP, then you can accept the disclaimer and join a server.
Yes its broken for a while now but only the 32Bit WIndows version.
